title: Document zero-leak policy in CONTRIBUTING.md and DESIGN.md
body:
Add the zero-leak policy to project documentation so all contributors (human and AI) know the rules.

**Deliverables:**
- Add a 'Memory Safety' section to CONTRIBUTING.md covering:
  - All tests MUST use std.testing.allocator (or ArenaAllocator wrapping it)
  - main.zig uses GPA with leak check in debug builds
  - Every allocation needs a corresponding defer free/deinit
  - Use errdefer for error path cleanup
  - ArenaAllocator for batch temporary allocations
- Add a coding standard to CLAUDE.md: 'Zero leaks â€” every test uses std.testing.allocator'
- Optionally add a note to DESIGN.md's Memory Management section referencing this policy

**Design notes:**
- The policy should be clear and actionable, not aspirational
- Include code examples of correct patterns (defer, errdefer, ArenaAllocator)
- Reference the decision document (docs/decisions/002-zero-leak-strategy.md)
